content.metaTitle: Luxury 4-Bed Chalet for Sale Jávea - €1,550,000 | MIR0089
content.metaDescription: Stunning 4-bedroom luxury chalet in Jávea's Monte Olimpo with sea & Montgó views. 235m² built, 1000m² plot, pool. 7 mins to beach. €1,550,000.
content.heroIntro:
Discover Villa Claudia, an exceptional luxury chalet that redefines Mediterranean living in one of Jávea's most prestigious locations. This stunning 4-bedroom residence combines contemporary architectural excellence with breathtaking panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, lush valley landscapes, and the iconic Montgó mountain, all from an elevated 1000m² plot in the exclusive Monte Olimpo urbanisation.

Designed with meticulous attention to detail, this 235m² masterpiece features flowing architectural lines, expansive windows, and an open-concept layout that seamlessly blends indoor and outdoor living. With its prime location just 7 minutes from pristine beaches and the flexibility to customise every detail to your personal taste, Villa Claudia represents the ultimate in Costa Blanca luxury living.

locationSection.intro:
Nestled in the prestigious Cap Martí - El Tossalet - Pinomar area of Jávea, this exceptional property enjoys one of the Costa Blanca's most coveted addresses. The Monte Olimpo urbanisation is renowned for its elevated position, offering residents unparalleled privacy, tranquility, and some of the most spectacular views on the entire coastline. This exclusive enclave attracts discerning international buyers seeking the perfect balance of natural beauty and sophisticated living.

Jávea itself is considered the jewel of the Costa Blanca, where the Mediterranean meets dramatic mountain landscapes. The town masterfully preserves its authentic Spanish charm while offering world-class amenities, making it a magnet for luxury property investors and those seeking an unparalleled quality of life. With its year-round mild climate, pristine beaches, and vibrant cultural scene, Jávea represents the very best of Mediterranean coastal living.
highlights: Just 7 minutes to Jávea's pristine sandy beaches and crystal-clear waters
Elevated position in exclusive Monte Olimpo urbanisation with premium neighbours
Panoramic views encompassing sea, valley, and the iconic Montgó Natural Park
Easy access to Jávea's historic town center, marina, and world-class restaurants
Strategic location between Valencia and Alicante airports for international connectivity

propertyFeatures.intro: Villa Claudia showcases the finest in contemporary luxury design, where every element has been carefully considered to create a residence of exceptional quality and comfort. The open-concept architecture maximises natural light and creates seamless flow between living spaces, while premium finishes and cutting-edge technology ensure a lifestyle of effortless elegance.
features: 4 spacious bedrooms including master suite with private terrace access
4 elegantly appointed bathrooms with high-end fixtures and finishes
Spectacular open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows
Fully equipped designer kitchen with premium appliances and materials
Expansive outdoor terrace with infinity pool and entertaining areas
Double garage with space for two vehicles plus additional storage
Ducted air conditioning and heating system throughout for year-round comfort
Customisable design allowing personalisation of finishes and layout
High-quality modern materials and construction standards
Mature landscaped gardens on 1000m² private plot

content.investmentSection:
Villa Claudia represents an exceptional investment opportunity in one of Spain's most sought-after luxury property markets. Jávea's premium real estate sector has demonstrated remarkable resilience and growth, driven by increasing international demand for high-quality properties in exclusive locations. The combination of limited supply in prestigious urbanisations like Monte Olimpo, coupled with the area's enduring appeal to affluent European buyers, creates strong fundamentals for long-term capital appreciation.

The luxury rental market in Jávea is equally compelling, with premium properties commanding substantial weekly rates throughout the extended season. Villa Claudia's exceptional views, proximity to beaches, and luxury amenities position it perfectly for the high-end vacation rental market, offering investors attractive rental yields while enjoying personal use of this magnificent property. The ability to customise the villa to the highest standards ensures it will remain competitive in the luxury market for years to come.
whyBuySection: Exclusive location in Jávea's most prestigious urbanisation with unparalleled sea and mountain views
Fully customisable luxury villa allowing you to create your perfect Mediterranean home
Just 7 minutes from pristine beaches yet elevated for privacy and panoramic vistas
Premium build quality by renowned developer Miralbo Urbana with proven track record
Strong investment potential in Costa Blanca's most desirable luxury property market
Generous 1000m² plot providing exceptional privacy and outdoor living opportunities
Turn-key luxury with high-end finishes, pool, and complete modern amenities included

faqs.question: What is the total price and are payment plans available?
faqs.answer: The asking price is €1,550,000. Flexible payment structures can be arranged, typically requiring a reservation fee, followed by stage payments during construction, with final payment on completion.

faqs.question: How close is the property to Jávea's beaches and amenities?
faqs.answer: Villa Claudia is strategically located just 7 minutes from Jávea's beautiful beaches. The town center with its restaurants, shops, and marina is easily accessible, while maintaining the privacy of an elevated, exclusive location.

faqs.question: What does the buying process involve for international buyers?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive support throughout the purchase process, including NIE number assistance, legal representation, and coordination with notaries. Our team guides international buyers through every step to ensure a smooth transaction.

faqs.question: Can you help arrange mortgage financing?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with Habeno and other leading mortgage providers who specialise in international buyers. Financing options up to 70% LTV are typically available for non-resident purchases.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential for this property?
faqs.answer: Luxury properties in Monte Olimpo command premium rental rates, particularly during peak season. The combination of sea views, pool, and proximity to beaches makes it highly attractive to discerning vacation rental guests.

faqs.question: When will the property be completed?
faqs.answer: As this is a build-to-order project, completion timeframes depend on customisation requirements and construction scheduling. Typical completion is 12-18 months from contract signing.

faqs.question: What is included in the sale price?
faqs.answer: The price includes the fully finished villa with pool, landscaped gardens, fitted kitchen, bathrooms, air conditioning/heating system, and double garage. Full specifications can be provided upon request.

faqs.question: Can we arrange a viewing of the plot and similar completed properties?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We can arrange site visits to view the plot and show you similar completed projects by Miralbo Urbana to demonstrate the exceptional quality and finish standards you can expect.

content.conclusion: Villa Claudia represents a rare opportunity to own a truly exceptional property in one of the Costa Blanca's most coveted locations. With its stunning views, luxury amenities, and prestigious address in Monte Olimpo, this property offers the perfect combination of investment potential and lifestyle excellence. Contact us today via WhatsApp at +34 634 044 970 to arrange your private viewing and take the first step towards owning your dream Mediterranean home.
